verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H3548>this<s%>, O ye priests, and <S%H7181>hearken<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>; for unto you pertaineth the <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; for ye have been a <S%H6341>snare<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, and a <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> upon <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>.
And the <S%H7846>revolters<s%> are gone <S%H6009>deep<s%> in making <S%H7819>slaughter<s%>; but I am a rebuker of them <S%H4148>all<s%>.

I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is not <S%H3582>hid<s%> from <S%H669>me<s%>; for now, O Ephraim, thou hast played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>.

Their <S%H4611>doings<s%> will not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> them to <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto their <S%H430>God<s%>; for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredom<s%> is <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>, and they know not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> doth <S%H6030>testify<s%> to his <S%H6440>face<s%>: therefore <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; <S%H3063>Judah<s%> also shall stumble with <S%H3782>them<s%>.

They shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and with their <S%H1241>herds<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; but they shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2502>him<s%>: he hath withdrawn himself from them.

They have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for they have <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>: now shall the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> them with their <S%H2506>fields<s%>.

Blow <S%H8628><s%> ye the <S%H7782>cornet<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, and the <S%H2689>trumpet<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>: sound an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> at <S%H1007>Beth-aven<s%>; <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H1144>thee<s%>, O Benjamin.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H8433>rebuke<s%>: among the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have I made <S%H3045>known<s%> that which shall surely <S%H539>be<s%>.
The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> are like them that <S%H5253>remove<s%> the <S%H1366>landmark<s%>: I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> upon them like <S%H4325>water<s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is <S%H6231>oppressed<s%>, he is <S%H7533>crushed<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; because he was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H6673>man<s%>'s command.
Therefore am I unto <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> as a <S%H6211>moth<s%>, and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as <S%H7538>rottenness<s%>.

When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H2483>sickness<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> saw his <S%H4205>wound<s%>, then <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb<s%>: but he is not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H1455>you<s%>, neither will he cure you of your <S%H4205>wound<s%>.

For I will be unto <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> as a <S%H7826>lion<s%>, and as a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: <S%H2963>I<s%>, even I, will tear and go <S%H3212>away<s%>; I will carry <S%H5375>off<s%>, and there shall be none to <S%H5337>deliver<s%>.

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H4725>place<s%>, till they acknowledge their <S%H816>offence<s%>, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>: in their <S%H6862>affliction<s%> they will seek me <S%H7836>earnestly<s%>.
